content:
If you have skills relevant to the Textile & Apparel eco-system (design, technical, advisory, etc.) join the ABANA platform and make yourself visible to buyers and sellers who will be able to search and connect with your directly. 

Sign on as a Service Provider under our Freelancer plan at US$ 9/month and showcase your abilities on the Bulletin Board page of your Profile.
subtitle: We support independent freelancers
